decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of  five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | Pouch box to be set back 0.5 metres from the edge of the kerb and thereafter maintained in this position.  REASON:  To prevent the retention of unnecessary street furniture. | In the event that the pouch box is no longer required for operational purposes it shall be removed promptly.  REASON:  To prevent the retention of unnecessary street furniture. | The pouch box hereby approved shall be kept in good condition and any graffiti shall be removed promptly.  REASON:  In the interests of the visual amenity of the area.
description: Installation of freestanding Royal Mail delivery pouch box
